1:
In my distress I called out to Yahweh,
\q and he answered me.
\q
2:
Rescue my life, Yahweh, from those who lie with their lips
\q and deceive with their tongues.
3:
How will he punish you, and what more will he do to you,
\q you who have a lying tongue?
\q
4:
He will punish you with the arrows of a warrior
\q sharpened over burning coals of the broom tree.
6:
For too long I have lived
\q with those who hate peace.
\q
7:
I am for peace,
\q but when I speak, they are for war.
